content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Contact the Team” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. is a leading residential and commercial contractor in Los Angeles for a reason. From residential renovation to commercial and structural engineering projects, the company consistently meets and exceeds expectations. Detailed craftsmanship and innovative methods empower the dedicated teams to develop inspiring, creative and economical plans for a wide variety of construction projects.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50″ el_class=”sacingNone”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”25″ el_class=”HeightNone”][vc_single_image image=”2475″ css_animation=”none” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”./general-contractors/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1582568724166{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”General Contracting” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flosangelesgeneralcontractor.com%2Fgeneral-contractors%2F|||”][vc_column_text]

From remodeling to building a new home from the ground up, Joel & Co. is passionate about creating a rewarding construction experience for our clients, our designers and trade partners, and our team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”mbRowhide”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″ el_class=”sacingNone”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”25″ el_class=”HeightNone”][vc_single_image image=”2474″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/custom-home-builder/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590387144191{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Custom Home Building” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flosangelesgeneralcontractor.com%2Fcustom-home-builder%2F|||”][vc_column_text]

The team at Joel & Co. possess a powerful understanding of the design process, and the creativity to synthesize it with construction planning.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”mbRowhide”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″ el_class=”sacingNone”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”25″ el_class=”HeightNone”][vc_single_image image=”2472″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/kitchen-remodeling/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590387233510{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Kitchen Remodeling” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flosangelesgeneralcontractor.com%2Fkitchen-remodeling%2F|||”][vc_column_text]

Remodeling the kitchen is a great way to give a home a facelift. Working within the client’s budget, Joel & Co. provides the best service and return on investment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”mbRowhide”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″ el_class=”sacingNone”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”25″ el_class=”HeightNone”][vc_single_image image=”2494″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/bathroom-remodeling/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590387271406{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Bathroom Remodeling” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flosangelesgeneralcontractor.com%2Fbathroom-remodeling%2F|||”][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. can transform any bathroom into a desirable retreat ⁠— bringing the vision of the homeowner to life by redesigning and remodeling their old bathrooms and transforming them into a dream space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”mbRowhide”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″ el_class=”sacingNone”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”25″ el_class=”HeightNone”][vc_single_image image=”2482″ css_animation=”none” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/room-additions/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590387304023{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Room Additions” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flosangelesgeneralcontractor.com%2Froom-additions%2F|||”][vc_column_text]

Adding additional rooms is an important job and is best left to an experienced room addition contractor. Joel & Co. provides renditions of the general and specific areas of the home to present the best plan of action for the new addition.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”mbRowhide”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″ el_class=”sacingNone”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”25″ el_class=”HeightNone”][vc_single_image image=”2484″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/commercial-construction” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590455885017{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Commercial Construction” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flosangelesgeneralcontractor.com%2Fcommercial-construction|||”][vc_column_text]

Whether you need to renovate a restaurant or build a new, high-end spa, Joel & Co.’s quality workmanship makes the planning and construction process simple and easy ⁠— resolving in a practical and attractive commercial space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”mbcolumnHide”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing=”30″ center_row=”yes”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40″ el_class=”height10″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
